pages.text: So this is what has been behind these global catastrophes all along? It has been carbon dioxide caused by fossil fuels such as oil & coal? Multiple centuries ago, I was one of the top executives making this disastrous decision for the rest of humanity? What could have drove my insanity to a point where the numbers rising in my bank account were more important, worth more

consideration and worship than the existence of all of the life on this planet? I am deeply ashamed, and I wonder about the state of the human condition which compelled millions, billions of people to allow my rise to the top, even while I stepped on their faces to get there.$(br2)Why was I and executives like me allowed to pass from the age we destroyed into the new one, while everyone else was butchered by natural disasters, pestilence, and war?

Even in this new age, having forgotten the past, I have polluted further in my quest to understand what happened. $(br2)I wonder if I would have done things differently if I knew then what I know now. Would I have found a different path that excludes the burning of fossil fuels? Would I have treated the lives of my workers as sacred and worth protecting, even if it meant that I would sacrifice my profits? I guess now that I know, I have a choice, but do I
really, in the face of all of the destruction I caused? I must follow a better path this time around.
